scripts.test:docker:report: npm run test:docker && npm run report:open
scripts.test:open:report: docker-compose run tests npx cypress run --spec cypress/integration/api/products/get-list-all-products.spec.ts && npm run report:open
scripts.test:products:get: docker-compose run tests npx cypress run --spec "cypress/integration/api/products/*.spec.ts" && npm run report:open
scripts.test:products:sort: docker-compose run tests npx cypress run --spec "cypress/integration/api/products/get-products-sorted-by-title-asc.spec.ts,cypress/integration/api/products/get-products-sorted-by-title-desc.spec.ts,cypress/integration/api/products/get-products-sorted-by-invalid-field.spec.ts" && npm run report:open
scripts.test:products:categories: docker-compose run tests npx cypress run --spec cypress/integration/api/products/get-all-products-categories.spec.ts && npm run report:open
scripts.test:products:category-list: docker-compose run tests npx cypress run --spec cypress/integration/api/products/get-category-list.spec.ts && npm run report:open
scripts.test:products:by-category: docker-compose run tests npx cypress run --spec cypress/integration/api/products/get-products-by-category.spec.ts && npm run report:open
